snippet.title: World War 3 - A Message From Kamil Bilczyński (Creative Director)
snippet.description:
Watch a special message from The Farm 51 and Kamil Bilczyński, Creative Director of World War 3, ahead of the launch of Open Beta.

World War 3 will be available in Open Beta from 29th September!   

Play World War 3: https://store.steampowered.com/app/674020/World_War_3/ 
  
World War 3 is an online multiplayer tactical FPS set against the backdrop of a modern global conflict. Team up to outgun and outflank the enemy in thrilling tactical skirmishes waged across real-world locations like Warsaw, Berlin, and Moscow. Customize your perfect loadout from a huge weapons arsenal, then deploy vehicles, gadgets, and drones, and call in strikes to seize the advantage. 
  
Visit the official World War 3 website: https://www.worldwar3.com  

YEAR 1 | Starter Pack now available: https://worldwar3.com/starter

Follow World War 3:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/worldwar3thegame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ww3thegame 
Discord: https://discord.gg/ww3thegame
